E

EncounterHandler - Class in opcode
This class is the class that runs each and every encounter in this combat system.
EncounterHandler() - Constructor for class opcode.EncounterHandler
The default constructor of the EncounterHandler class constructs the defaultencounter ArrayList.
entities - package entities
 
entities.characters - package entities.characters
 
entities.monsters - package entities.monsters
 
Entity - Class in entities
The basic combat actor of this system.
Entity() - Constructor for class entities.Entity
 
equals(Entity) - Method in class entities.characters.AbstractChar
Checks if the other Entity is equal to this Entity by checking if it is an instance of AbstractChar, then checking the value of each stat across both AbstractChars.
equals(Entity) - Method in class entities.monsters.Monster
This method checks for equivalency by first checking if the other Entity is a Monster, and then checking each stat.
equals(Item) - Method in class items.consumables.AbstractConsumable
Checks if the other item is an instance of a consumable, then checks the names, buffed stats, modifier values, and durations.
equals(Item) - Method in interface items.Item
Checks if this item is equal to another item by comparing the names and every stat.
equals(Item) - Method in class items.weapons.AbstractWeapon
Checks if the other item is an instance of a weapon, and then compares their names and damage stats.
equip(Item) - Method in class entities.characters.AbstractChar
This method lets the character equip a weapon in their inventory.
equip(int) - Method in class entities.characters.AbstractChar
This method checks if the item in the specified slot in the inventory is a weapon, then runs the equip(Weapon newWeapon) method if it is.
equip(Weapon) - Method in class entities.characters.AbstractChar
The fully abstracted equip method.
